1040.issue: [E1040] width and height of logo (specified at "common.extIcon") are not equal

1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 2.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/Apollon77/ioBroker.meross/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/Apollon77/ioBroker.meross/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/Apollon77/ioBroker.meross/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/Apollon77/ioBroker.meross/blob/master/io-package.json).

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/Apollon77/ioBroker.meross/blob/master/package.json).
